item.title: Best places in Karnataka to travel solo in Hot Summer?
item.description: Traveling solo in Karnataka during hot summers can be a delightful experience, especially when you explore destinations with cooler climates or indoor attractions. Karnataka offers a diverse range of destinations that are perfect for traveling during hot summers. Here are some of the best places to visit in Karnataka during the hot summer months: Coorg (Kodagu): Known as the "Scotland of
